title: Dhruv Gautam
main_content: Dhruv Gautam 🧸 Blogs Google Scholar Hi! I'm an undergrad at UC Berkeley studying Computer Science. My Current Interests Include: Neural Network Intepretability Reinforcement Learning Code Generation Interwar Eastern Europe Fresh Expo Markers I currently spend my time researching at BAIR . I also work on creative ML projects with friends in Launchpad and explore cryptography with friends in Blockchain at Berkeley . Previously, I've worked at Microsoft Research on post-training, code generation, and agents, and in a couple groups within Berkeley's SkyLab on consensus and distributed systems. Feel free to reach out to: dhruvgautam (at) berkeley (dot) edu And you can follow me on Twitter at: @dhrvji Preprints & Publications WebGauntlet: Measuring Instruction Following and Robustness for Web Agents Sasank Aduri, Dhruv Gautam Under Review. SSEAL: Self-Supervised Explorative Agent Learning Evan Frick, Dylan Goetting, Dhruv Gautam Under Review. 1st Place in UC Berkeley LLM Agents Hackathon. RefactorBench: Evaluating Stateful Reasoning in Language Agents Through Code Dhruv Gautam* , Spandan Garg, Jinu Jang, Neel Sundaresan, Roshanak Zilouchian Moghaddam ICLR 2025 OWA @ NeurIPS 2024
